title: How does technology affect the price? - Quora

response.answer_text: Its similar to an iceberg. The cost of adding the raw technology is what you see above the water. The screen, keyboard, memory, etc. The larger costs for adding technology are in programming, engineering, development and support. Every added level of complexity or features has to come from somewhere. That is why Apple reduces the price of last years iPhone release. Much of the R&D was accounted for in the first year of sales.
